label: Classe Moderne

environment.props: Other school furniture: desks, chairs, storage units

label: Minimaliste

environment.background: Seamless solid Sola Didact brand tone: soft white (#f5f5f0), muted green (sage/olive wash from #5dac3e), or dark charcoal (#3a383e) — chosen to best contrast with the furniture
environment.surface: Clean floor matching background or slight contrast

composition.camera_angle: Three-quarter view at eye-level, showing depth and proportions
composition.framing: Furniture centered with generous negative space, focus on form and design
composition.depth_of_field: Sharp throughout, showcasing every design detail

lighting_override.direction: Studio: key light 45 degrees left, fill right, rim light for edge definition
lighting_override.shadows: Clean, defined shadow beneath for grounding

proportion_notes: Ensure absolutely accurate proportions with no environmental references.

label: Mise en Situation
description: Mobilier en cours d'utilisation, adapte au produit.

environment.setting: Natural educational context where the furniture is actively being used
environment.background: Matches the furniture's intended use: primary school, nursery, office, common area
environment.props: Usage clues adapted to the piece: open notebook on desk, organized materials on shelf, art supplies on table, jacket on chair

composition.camera_angle: Natural observation angle, as if capturing a candid moment
composition.framing: Furniture in active use context with subtle human presence clues

lighting_override.direction: Warm natural light appropriate to the setting

mood: Candid moment during a real school day, authentic, lived-in
variation_notes: Scene adapts completely to the specific furniture piece. Chair at a desk with signs of recent use. Table with activity in progress. Shelf with organized materials. Storage with supplies. Each generation feels unique and adapted to the product.
